comments: Won't let me do anything. Everytime I try to follow someone or like someone - to get coins, it just tells me "we restrict certain activity" then gives me a timer. If I wait til the timer goes down and try again, it just shows me the same message again and won't let me do anything and repeat the cycle of message and timer. So I literally can't do anything on the app or earn any coins for some reason.

At first glance it looked as if it was one of those fraudulent apps but I installed it and to my surprise it worked like a charm. I instantly got big time followers in a span of only 10 minutes. I recommend this app. I am not a bot and purely found out about this app through my curiosity. Trust me, it's not the most amazing app but it can guarantee you a good amount of followers.
This app is solid. I've never used something better and I'm glad I came across it. Everything is simple to understand and you get what you asked for in no time. And these people are absolutely real!!

This app is AMAZING and the reason i say that is all you have to do is download the app like peoples photos and follow people on there, you can also choose if you want to follow the people on there or not.Thats how you get enough coins to get likes,comments, and followers and the followers are real people.

Pretty good app, you do have to work for the coins if you dont want to pay for the coins.. takes a while but its pretty nice, i use it for more likes, i dont really care about the followers but just by opening the app it gave me 5 free followers so I'm not complaining, the followers showed up pretty quick ngl

This app works pretty well and I am overall satisfied. You cannot like/comment/follow too many times or else IG flags you, but that isn't the apps fault at all. I've been able to grow multiple pages and gain a following with the help of this app.

I personally love the content just maybe tweak a few things or add any other features. The quick add coins button takes a few minutes to reload so because it makes you wait for your hourly coins and that's all there is to do people will say it is not engaged enough and not keep the app.

This app does work, what you have to do is like posts that get sent to your feed and you earn coins. The more coins you obtain the more chances of getting likes or followes increases because they show up other people's feeds and they are free to decide if they want to like your post or not. It is similar to promoting your post! üòä

The app does what it says it is going to do. There are some minor glitches here and there but I still appreciate the opportunity. You can't really get a bunch of likes or follows without paying, so you have to watch a lot of ads.
A good functioning app with not many ads while flipping through pages to earn coins, and it's an enjoyable app.
The app is pretty good.. what i like most about it tho is that we can easily earn coins to get REAL followers, likes and comments without being constantly interrupted by unnecessary ads
It actually works! This is overall an very impressive and not scam app. Though coins are a bit hard to earn and it takes time if you don't want to pay, it's still good!
It's a great little app. Not in your face at all. And whereas I had steeled myself for another scammy app, my surprise was palpable. Wow. Nice one guys keep it going
It works really well! There's no ADS you want to get money for the ads and their short and simple! And the prices for the coins aren't high!
Definitely does what it says it does. Best to get golden users. Much more cost efficient than other, more popular, online services. 5 stars.

I love this app it does give you followers and is pretty easy. You can spend your money if you want to make it faster. The follower's are real so it's up to them if they want to stay and follow you but it's so cool!!
Great app, it deserves a 5 star rating. Very user friendly, works fast and easy. Definitely recommend it and give it 5 stars
Really helpful! They helped me grow my account! It's pretty easy to get coins and the followers come in so quickly!

So far, so good. I'm loving the app... no pop up adds or anything... very easy to use.

It's a pretty good app, I just wish you could earn coins faster or at least the amount needed for likes would be lower.
